about_the_game:
Thanks for checking out Doloc Town demo version! In this work-in-progress build, players will get to enjoy a 3-hour wholesome experience and get a taste of what Doloc Town has to offer.

Embark on a journey to Doloc Town, a post-apocalyptic oasis filled with abandoned ruins, unique architecture and warm-hearted people.

Build your farm and get to know the stories of this forgotten land. Thrive and discover your destiny as you explore deeper into this unknown territory.

Gather resources to get your farm started. As a farmer, you're tasked with planting, watering, harvesting, and even shielding crops from adverse weather.

Construct buildings, upgrade facilities and craft advanced tools to turn your little corner into a farming paradise!

Explore this unknown terorritory, with intricate valley, treacherous wetland and abanoned ruins awaits. Scout the vast, untouched wilderness in search for secret relics & treasures and more!

At the center of the map lies Doloc Town, a post-apocalyptic sanctuary built from the debris of trains and bridge structures. Get to know the townsfolk and connect with them for much-needed resources. Have a drink with villagers to discover their stories and unfold the hidden secrets of this land.

Above all, the key is to endure the wasteland and pursue whatever your heart truly desires.

Unlock your drone companion and enjoy fast-paced bullet hell combat! Shoot, refill, and dodge your way through this unknown wilderness. Upgrade & modify your weaponry to fit various combat needs. Slay dangerous creatures and face ever stronger enemies encountered along the way!

short_description: Doloc Town is a cozy pixel art farm simulation game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Build your dream farm from scratch and explore this mysterious wasteland. Harvest, plant, build, and battle against ferocious creatures while discover the untold stories of this forgotten land!
